name: Swooped
description: Swooped is an AI-powered job search platform that optimizes resumes and cover letters to help job seekers land remote jobs faster.
longDescription: Swooped is a job search platform designed to streamline the application process using AI-driven tools for resume and cover letter optimization. Founded by Benri Labs LLC, it aims to help job seekers land their dream roles by enhancing their application materials to pass Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and attract recruiter attention. The platform also features a curated job board focused on remote and hybrid roles from top tech companies. Swooped addresses common job search challenges by automating repetitive tasks and providing personalized job matches. Its mission is to make job hunting more efficient, saving users time and increasing their chances of securing interviews. Over 600,000 job seekers have used Swooped, reflecting its growing popularity and effectiveness.
features: AI Resume Generator creates keyword-optimized resumes to pass ATS filters and highlight relevant skills for targeted roles.
AI Cover Letter Generator produces job-specific cover letters in seconds, saving time and ensuring alignment with job requirements.
One-Click Applications allow users to apply to multiple jobs quickly using optimized resumes and cover letters.
Remote Job Board curates hundreds of remote and hybrid job listings from top tech companies for easy discovery.
Job Application Tracker organizes applications, resumes, and interview notes in one place for streamlined job search management.
Personalized Job Matches deliver daily job recommendations based on user profiles and preferences.
ATS Resume Grading provides instant feedback and specific improvement suggestions to boost resume effectiveness.
Networking Tools help users identify and connect with professionals at target companies to build meaningful relationships.
Chrome Extension enables one-click saving of job listings from any website for efficient tracking.

faqs.question: Is Swooped free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Swooped offers a free plan with unlimited job applications, one AI-generated resume, and one AI-generated cover letter, with no time limit.

faqs.question: How does Swooped optimize resumes for ATS systems?
faqs.answer: Swooped’s AI analyzes job descriptions to incorporate relevant keywords and formats resumes to achieve a 92% ATS pass rate.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my paid subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time, and your plan remains active until the end of the billing period.

faqs.question: Will employers detect that my resume is AI-generated?
faqs.answer: No, Swooped’s templates use industry-standard structures and natural language, allowing you to edit the output to reflect your voice.

faqs.question: Does Swooped offer jobs directly or act as a recruiter?
faqs.answer: Swooped is not a recruiter but a platform that curates job listings and provides AI tools to optimize applications.

faqs.question: What types of jobs are listed on Swooped?
faqs.answer: Swooped features a curated job board with remote and hybrid roles, particularly from top tech companies across various industries.

faqs.question: How does the job application tracker work?
faqs.answer: The tracker organizes job applications, stores resumes and cover letters, and allows users to manage interview notes in one place.

faqs.question: Can I use Swooped for non-tech jobs?
faqs.answer: Yes, while focused on tech, Swooped’s AI tools can optimize applications for various industries by tailoring to specific job descriptions.
